projects.title: Live - A Company WebSite
projects.description: This is a Personal Project with a DashBoard create with Material-UI. All the sections are editable in the admin Panel. There is a collection of images managed with AWS S3. The website can set a position of GoogleMaps. Products, Services and Social Networks can be created, edited and removed.

projects.title: Live - Meal Finder App
projects.description: This is a Personal Project where the main purpose is know basics about the payment service with Razoray using React and NodeJS. It's very useful for Indian companies

projects.title: Demo - Pacman css-Animation
projects.description: This is a Personal Project where the main purpose is know basics about socket.io with React and NodeJS. This is a responsive website where an User can join in a public chat and share text between other users connected.

EducationInfo.title: Hi! I am Madiha Eman
EducationInfo.text: I live in Karachi, Pakistan. I'm a Web Developer focused on building high-quality, thoughtful, and intuitive websites and web applications. Currently, I'm pursuing a certificate in Web App Development and Design at Saylani Mass IT Training Institution. I value the ideas of hard-work and persistence. These values have aided my career as a developer and have shaped me into the person I am today. I like to spend my free time adding on to my web stack and chasing my dream of becoming a best web developer. Other than coding, I find myself in singing and drawing
